hero.title: Automate Your Marketing with AI That Actually Works
hero.subtitle: ArgiFlow combines 10 specialized AI agents to handle your leads, appointments, email campaigns, and sales funnels — so you can focus on closing deals.

services.sectionSubtitle: From lead generation to closing deals, ArgiFlow handles every step of your marketing pipeline with specialized AI agents.

0.title: AI Lead Generation

testimonials.sectionSubtitle: See what our customers have to say about ArgiFlow.

0.quote: ArgiFlow transformed our lead generation. We went from 50 leads a month to over 500 with the same team size.
0.author: Sarah Chen

1.quote: The Voice AI agent handles 80% of our inbound calls now. Our team can focus on closing deals instead of answering phones.
1.author: Marcus Johnson

2.quote: We replaced 3 different marketing tools with ArgiFlow. The AI agents work together seamlessly and the results speak for themselves.
2.author: Emily Rodriguez

faq.sectionSubtitle: Everything you need to know about ArgiFlow.

0.question: What is ArgiFlow?
0.answer: ArgiFlow is an AI-powered marketing automation platform that uses specialized AI agents to handle lead generation, email campaigns, voice calling, sales funnels, and more.

1.question: How does the free trial work?
1.answer: You get full access to your chosen plan for 14 days. No credit card required. If you love it, choose a plan. If not, no charges.

2.question: Can I change plans later?
2.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately and billing is prorated.

3.question: Do I need technical skills?
3.answer: Not at all. ArgiFlow is designed for non-technical users. Our AI agents handle the complexity while you use a simple dashboard.

4.question: What integrations are available?
4.answer: ArgiFlow integrates with all major CRMs, email providers, phone systems, calendars, and social media platforms. We also offer a REST API for custom integrations.

5.question: Is my data secure?
5.answer: Absolutely. We use enterprise-grade encryption, SOC2 compliance, and never share your data with third parties.

botTemplates.subtitle: {{count}} proven bot templates. Each one handled thousands of real conversations. Pick a template, install in 15 minutes, and start delivering results.
botTemplates.installedMessage: AI agent created and active — View it in AI Agents to manage settings.

0.name: Real Estate Agent
0.description: Qualifies buyers/sellers, schedules showings, handles objections. Pre-loaded with MLS integration scripts.

1.name: Dental Receptionist
1.description: Books appointments, handles insurance questions, sends reminders. HIPAA-compliant conversation flows.

2.name: Legal Intake Bot
2.description: Screens potential cases, collects intake info, schedules consultations. Built for PI, family, and criminal law.

3.name: Auto Dealership
3.description: Handles inventory questions, schedules test drives, captures trade-in info. Works with any DMS.

4.name: Fitness Studio
4.description: Books classes, handles membership questions, promotes personal training packages. Integrates with scheduling.

5.name: Home Services
5.description: Captures service requests, dispatches techs, handles emergency calls. Priority routing for urgent issues.

6.name: Restaurant Concierge
6.description: Takes reservations, handles catering inquiries, manages waitlists. Multi-location support built in.

7.name: Education Enrollor
7.description: Handles enrollment questions, schedules campus tours, processes applications. Perfect for schools and tutoring.

8.name: Insurance Quoter
8.description: Collects quote info, compares policies, books consultations. Works for auto, home, life, and commercial.

9.name: Wellness Clinic
9.description: Books treatments, handles consultation requests, promotes packages. Built for med spas and aesthetic clinics.

10.name: Medical Billing Assistant
10.description: Handles patient billing inquiries, payment plans, insurance claim status, and collections follow-up. Reduces AR days and improves cash flow.

11.name: Revenue Cycle Manager
11.description: End-to-end RCM automation: eligibility checks, prior authorizations, denial management, and patient statement follow-up. Built for healthcare practices and billing companies.

12.name: Tax Lien Hunter
12.description: Discovers tax lien properties, analyzes ROI, monitors auctions, and manages your lien portfolio automatically. Crawls county databases across 10+ states with AI-powered deal scoring.

13.name: Tax Deed Agent
13.description: Finds tax deed properties before auction, evaluates title risk, estimates after-repair value, and tracks redemption periods. Built for investors seeking full property ownership.

14.name: Wholesale RE Agent
14.description: Finds off-market wholesale deals, analyzes comps, generates contracts, and matches properties to your buyer list. Automates the entire wholesale pipeline from lead to assignment.

15.name: Govt Contracts Agent
15.description: Monitors SAM.gov, GovWin, and agency portals for contract opportunities matching your NAICS codes. Analyzes RFPs, tracks deadlines, and scores win probability.

16.name: Arbitrage Agent
16.description: Scans retail and wholesale sources for profitable arbitrage opportunities. Tracks price differentials, calculates ROI after fees, and monitors inventory availability in real-time.

17.name: Lead Gen Agent
17.description: Multi-channel lead generation across web directories, social media, and intent data sources. Enriches contacts, scores leads by buying signals, and auto-drafts personalized outreach.

adTemplates.subtitle: Facebook ads that generated $450K from $50K spend. Copy and paste our winning creatives.
adTemplates.copiedMessage: Copied to clipboard — Paste into your ad manager to launch this campaign.
adTemplates.copiedToast: Full ad copy and hook are in your clipboard. Paste into your Facebook/Instagram ad manager.

0.name: The Problem-Solution Ad
0.hook: Your phone rings. Nobody answers. That customer just called your competitor.
0.description: Pain-point focused ad that highlights missed calls and lost revenue. Proven performer across 50+ campaigns.

1.name: The Before/After Ad
1.hook: Before AI: 23% of calls answered. After AI: 100% of calls answered. 24/7.
1.description: Side-by-side comparison showing transformation. Works especially well with real client data.

2.name: The Demo Video Ad
2.hook: Watch this AI answer a real call in 0.3 seconds...
2.description: Short-form video showing the AI in action. Highest engagement rate of all our creatives.

3.name: The ROI Calculator Ad
3.hook: How much revenue are you losing from missed calls? Enter your numbers.
3.description: Interactive lead form ad that pre-qualifies prospects by having them calculate their own lost revenue.

4.name: The Testimonial Carousel
4.hook: 3 business owners. 3 industries. Same result: Never miss a call again.
4.description: Multi-slide carousel with real client testimonials and results. High trust factor.

5.name: The Scarcity Ad
5.hook: We only onboard 5 new AI voice clients per week. 2 spots left.
5.description: Urgency-driven ad with limited availability messaging. Best for filling pipeline fast.

funnels.importedMessage: Imported — Go to Sales Funnels to customize pages and launch.
funnels.importedToast: Go to Sales Funnels to customize your {{pages}}-page funnel and launch it.

0.name: AI Voice Demo Funnel
0.description: Complete VSL funnel with demo video, ROI calculator, social proof, and booking page. Import-ready.

1.name: Webinar Registration Funnel
1.description: Automated webinar funnel that educates prospects and books demos. Includes replay and follow-up emails.

2.name: Free Audit Funnel
2.description: Offer a free missed-call audit to prospects. Captures info, delivers report, books strategy call.

3.name: Case Study Funnel
3.description: Showcase client success stories with data. Builds credibility and drives warm leads to booking.

blueprint.title: Organic Client Blueprint
blueprint.subtitle: Land $5K clients with $0 ad spend. The same outreach methods that landed corporate clients cold. Follow this 10-day playbook to sign your first client without spending a dollar on ads.

0.title: Identify Your Target Niche
0.description: Pick 2-3 industries from the bot templates. These have proven demand. Focus where businesses answer phones daily.

1.title: Build Your Hit List
1.description: Use Google Maps, Yelp, and industry directories. Find businesses with bad reviews about phone service. These are warm leads.

2.title: Create Personalized Demos
2.description: Use the 1-Click Demo Builder for each prospect. Takes 3 minutes per demo. They see their business with AI already working.

3.title: Send Cold Outreach
3.description: Use the proven email/DM templates below. Include the personalized demo link. Follow up 3 times over 7 days.

4.title: Run Discovery Calls
4.description: Use the SPIN framework: Situation, Problem, Implication, Need-payoff. Let the prospect talk 80% of the time.

5.title: Close & Install
5.description: Use the 15-Minute Installation Checklist. Charge $5,000 setup + $997/month. Install same day. Start ROI immediately.

0.name: Cold Email #1 - The Missed Call Approach
0.subject: Quick question about [Business Name]'s phone system
0.preview: I called [Business Name] at [time] yesterday and got voicemail. I'm guessing I'm not the only one...

1.name: Cold Email #2 - The Data Drop
1.subject: [Business Name] is losing ~$X/month from missed calls
1.preview: The average [industry] business misses 32% of inbound calls. At your average ticket of $X...

2.name: LinkedIn DM - The Demo Share
2.preview: Hey [Name], I built something for [Business Name] - an AI that answers your phones 24/7. Here's a 60-second demo with your actual business name...

3.name: Follow-up #3 - The Case Study
3.subject: How [Similar Business] added $14K/mo from missed calls
3.preview: [Similar Business] was missing 28% of their calls. We set up AI voice for them in 15 minutes...

sops.title: 5-Minute Agency SOPs
sops.subtitle: Every procedure documented and recorded. Installation, sales, support, quality control, scaling, and team training. Hand any task to a VA instantly. Your agency runs like clockwork from day one.
sops.accessedMessage: SOPs accessed — Follow each checklist step-by-step for best results.

toast.installationFailedDescription: Something went wrong. Please try again.
toast.sopsAccessedDescription: {{count}} procedures ready. Follow each checklist step-by-step for best results.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: This is your control center. Update your business info, connect external services, and turn features on or off. Each section below explains what it does and how it helps your business.

companyProfile.sectionDescription: Tell ArgiFlow about your business so the AI can create strategies and bot scripts tailored specifically to your industry and services.
companyProfile.title: Business Information
companyProfile.description: This info powers your AI marketing strategy, customizes your bot scripts, and helps the AI chat assistant understand your business. The more detail you add, the better results you'll get.
companyProfile.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe your products, services, target customers, and goals. The more detail you provide, the better strategy our AI can generate...
companyProfile.descriptionHint: Min 10 characters. Be specific for a better AI strategy.

websiteTraining.sectionDescription: Let AI read your website and learn about your services, pricing, and target audience. This knowledge is used to configure your AI agents so they can represent your business accurately and generate leads.
websiteTraining.title: AI Website Analysis
websiteTraining.trainingDescription: AI is currently reading and analyzing your website. This usually takes 30-60 seconds...
websiteTraining.failedDescription: Training failed. Please check your website URL and try again.
websiteTraining.defaultDescription: Click the button below to have AI analyze your website and learn about your business.

integrations.sectionDescription: Connect your external services here so ArgiFlow can send emails, texts, and sync data on your behalf. Each card explains what the service does — only connect the ones you need.

email.title: Email (SendGrid)
email.description: Connect your SendGrid account to send outreach emails. Enter your API key and the verified sender email from your SendGrid account. Emails will be sent from your own domain.

phone.title: Grasshopper (Phone)
phone.description: If you use Grasshopper as your business phone, enter the number here so your Voice AI agents can be linked to it for call routing and tracking.

calendar.title: Calendar Link
calendar.description: Paste your online booking link here (from Calendly, Cal.com, or similar). When your AI bot wants to schedule a meeting with a lead, it will share this link automatically.

webhook.title: Webhook URL
webhook.description: A webhook sends your lead and appointment data to other tools you use — like Zapier, Make, or your own CRM system. If you don't use these tools, you can skip this one.

notifications.sectionDescription: Control how and when ArgiFlow notifies you about activity on your account.

emailNotifications.label: Email Notifications
emailNotifications.description: When ON: You'll get email alerts whenever a new lead comes in, an appointment is booked, or a campaign finishes.

smsNotifications.label: SMS Notifications
smsNotifications.description: When ON: You'll receive text messages for time-sensitive updates like new leads and appointment confirmations. Requires Twilio integration below.

appointmentReminders.label: Appointment Reminders
appointmentReminders.description: When ON: Both you and your clients get automatic reminders before scheduled meetings so nobody forgets.

weeklyReport.label: Weekly Report
weeklyReport.description: When ON: Every Monday you'll receive a summary showing how many leads, appointments, and conversions happened last week.

aiAutomation.sectionDescription: These controls turn on AI-powered features that work in the background to help you capture and manage leads automatically.

aiAutoRespond.label: AI Auto-Respond
aiAutoRespond.description: When ON: Your AI bots will automatically reply to new leads and inquiries the moment they come in — even outside business hours.

leadScoring.label: Lead Scoring
leadScoring.description: When ON: Each lead gets an automatic quality score (1-100) based on their engagement level, helping you focus on the hottest prospects first.

preferences.sectionDescription: General account preferences for your ArgiFlow experience.

darkMode.label: Dark Mode
darkMode.description: When ON: Switches the platform to a darker color scheme that's easier on your eyes.

twoFactorAuth.label: Two-Factor Authentication
twoFactorAuth.description: When ON: Adds an extra security step when logging in to protect your account.

toast.companySavedDescription: Your business information has been updated.
toast.companyFailedDescription: Please check all fields and try again.
toast.missingInfoDescription: Please fill in company name, industry, and description (at least 10 characters).
toast.websiteTrainingStartedDescription: Our AI is reading your website now. This usually takes 30-60 seconds.
toast.websiteTrainingFailedDescription: Could not analyze your website. Please check the URL and try again.
toast.noWebsiteUrlDescription: Please enter your website URL in the Company Profile section above first.

checklist.title: 15-Minute Installation Process
checklist.subtitle: The checklist that turns 5-hour custom jobs into 15-minute profits. Login, paste, connect, test, deliver, get paid. Refined over 500+ installations.

0.title: Log into ArgiFlow dashboard
0.description: Access your client's workspace and navigate to Voice AI.

1.description: Choose from 10 proven templates. Each has pre-built conversation flows.

2.title: Customize greeting with business name

3.title: Set up notification preferences

0.title: Run 3 test calls (inbound scenarios)

1.description: Confirm leads from test calls appear in the client's CRM.

2.title: Send client welcome email + training video
2.description: Use the pre-written template. Includes dashboard login and quick-start video.

3.title: Mark installation complete
3.description: Flag the account as live. Monitoring begins automatically.
